casebody.data:
Richard MUCIA, Thomas Varga, Christopher Jarema and Giancarlo Russo, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
MIDDLESEX COUNTY, Middlesex County Sheriff's Office, Defendants-Respondents. C-1003 September Term 2017
080837 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 6, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001564-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
